title: reporting players who scam
body: How do you report players who scam? I've looked all through support and riot just seem's to make it impossible to do so. I know of a guy who has been scamming a heap of people recently and getting away with it, and he just laughs in my face when I say he'll get banned. Please give me a link or can a rioter contact me some how so we can catch this guy?!

replies.body: Hey there, for reports like this please [submit a support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new). It will be escalated for investigation.
